body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Tuvalu_svg skin-vector

div.p: Flag_of_Tuvalu.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,000 × 500 pixels, file size: 9 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

div.p: Flag of Tuvalu originally from the Open Clip Art website.

ul.li: Pantone 549C for sky blue used by the British Navy ([1])
Pantone 116C for the stars described as 'golden yellow' ([2], [3], [4])
Pantone 186C and 280C for the Union Jack ([5])
Conversions to RGB values in Photoshop

div.p: n.b. If you make any changes to this flag, please make sure to make the same changes to .

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; text-align:center; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f9f9f9; border:2px solid #e0e0e0; direction: ltr;

td.span: This file is from the Open Clip Art Library, which released it explicitly into the public domain, using the Creative Commons Public Domain Dedication.

span.small: To the uploader: Please provide as parameter the link to the page where this image appears.

p.span: Česky | Ελληνικά | English | Español | Français | Македонски | Polski | Português | Português do Brasil | Română | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:23, 21 June 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 13:22, 1 November 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 21:20, 9 May 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 17:45, 10 February 2006

td.span: (PMS 549C for sky blue (see Flag of Fiji.svg), 116C for 'golden yellow stars' (http://www.flag.de/FOTW/flags/tv.html, http://www.crwflags.com/fotw/flags/xf-colo.html, http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/tuvalu.htm), conversion to RGB in Photoshop)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 00:08, 18 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 23:15, 17 January 2006

td.span: (The "sky blue" is Pantone 549C. Pantone 549C: Cyan = 52% Magenta = 6% Yellow = 0% Black (K) = 25%. Red = 99% Cyan = 153% Blue = 171% Greentubing 23:11, 17 January 2006 (UTC))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:50, 6 January 2006

td.span: (Lifted the stars from the Open Clip Art version of the Tuvalu flag (PD). Got a PD Union from the Flag of Australia. Changed the sky blue to R74, G132, B165, A255 to match other WP sky blue flags. )

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:49, 24 November 2005

td.span: (Flag of Tuvalu from the [http://openclipart.org/ Open Clip Art] website. {{PD-OpenClipart}} Category:SVG flags)
